meta.name: Description
meta.content: At Microsoft our mission and values are to help people and businesses throughout the world realize their full potential.

iframe.style: width: 0px; height: 0px; border: 0px none; display: none;

p.span: Try Microsoft Edge, a fast and secure browser that's designed for Windows 10

audio.p: These devices make Windows come to life.

img.alt: People watching a movie on a PC

div.p: Find the technology you need for home, school, work, and fun.

audio.p: Access your files anywhere, online or offline.

audio.p: Download the free 90-day evaluation for IT professionals.
Order the development edition. Transform your world.

img.alt: Hands hold an insect with tweezers and a vial

audio.p: This cloud turns tiny insects into big data.

div.p: Ros Harvey built an "internet of oysters" that uses the IoT to power sustainable farming.
